channel.title: Okay im completely new to this kind of coding and i need help
channel.description: Could anyone just like explain how i would make a macro for rs? I dont know if it would be easy or hard, so if its hard, plz tell me lol.

item.source: Okay im completely new to this kind of coding and i need help

item.title: Okay im completely new to this kind of coding and i need help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

a scar script isnt a macro.
Scar is the macro.

If he means making a macro it is hard.

If you are lookin at those recordable mouse macro tutorials to use for RS you may aswell send andrew gower a letter politely asking him to ban you. However i suggest having a look at cruelslib for an intro to making your own macros. Im not 100% sure how it works but it seems like an extension for vb and c giving you use of cruels functions although the downside is its forced to display a splashscreen.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay im completely new to this kind of coding and i need help

item.title: Okay im completely new to this kind of coding and i need help
item.dc:creator: @zstars zstars
item.description:
@zstars wrote:

Depends what you consider a macro. If by macro you mean, for example, an Scar script, it depends on the script. An auto alcher, for example, would be very easy, but a coal miner with banker and randoms support, is hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay im completely new to this kind of coding and i need help

item.description:
@Criptic wrote:

easy/medium/hard it depends how good you want it to be i have had a go at looking for some tutorials for making a auto clicker in delphi but nothing came up so im going to have a go in Vb and or Java if i can get it to work
